pages.text: $(li)The Guardian Spine only turns on when receives a nearby redstone signal.$(br)$(li)When a nearby creature steps on the Elder Guardian Spine, its walking, attack and mining speed will be considerably reduced and it will receive a damage of 2 heart per second.
$(li)This item only can be dropped by the $(l:patchouli:bosses/elder_guardian)Elder Guardian$(/l).
